mobile_tool_benefits.description: ALL benefits of mobile tools, not just space savings and flexibility

example_layout.note: Major machines stored & fully functional in 160 sq ft; arrangement housed major tools in ~80 sq ft (illustrates ~50% of area dedicated to stowable machines).

items.source: Fine Woodworking one-car garage shop PDF (storage of planer under saw; bandsaw/jointer on mobile bases; machines functional within 160 sq ft; major tools housed in ~80 sq ft).
Fine Woodworking: mobile bases allow relocation; bandsaw rolled into open areas; router table attached to saw to consolidate footprint.

quantified_benefits.incident_risk_reduction_notes: Ability to position tool with full infeed/outfeed reduces binding/kickback likelihood; total-lock casters prevent creep.

items.source: Rockler caster guide (total-lock casters stop roll + swivel). Wood Magazine mobile bases with pads for stationary use.
General small-shop practice: rolling tools for 360° access; mobile bases with drop-down pads enable solid parking while cleaning.

quantified_benefits.capex_avoided: Larger fixed shop or second tool stations not required

items.source: Flip-top cart plans; FWW outfeed table doubles as storage.

quantified_benefits.winter_operation_notes: Poly/ rubber wheels roll better in cold; avoid condensation on cold iron.

items.source: Winterizing/rust prevention guidance for small woodshops.

mobile_tool_requirements.description: ALL requirements for mobile tools, not just casters, power, and dust

items.requirement_type: Casters & bases — load rating and safety factor

specifications.rating_basis: Per-caster rating × number of casters ≥ (tool_weight + base_weight) × safety_factor
specifications.example: 270 lb saw on 4 casters → min per-caster rating ≈ (270×1.33)/4 ≈ 90 lb

items.source: Caster capacity determination & 33% safety margin guidance.

specifications.notes: Larger wheels roll easier over cracks/debris; smaller wheels lower center of gravity.

specifications.lock_type: Total-lock (wheel + swivel) on all corners for precision tools

items.source: Rockler (total-lock) and Wood Magazine (bases with foot pads; all-terrain base with 5" locking casters).
Wood Magazine ‘Going Mobile: 5 Mobile Base Options’.

specifications.dedicated_circuits: Separate circuits for dust collection and high-draw tools when possible
specifications.code_US: NEC 210.8(A) — GFCI for 125–250V receptacles in garages and similar (150V to ground); AFCI as applicable
specifications.code_CA: CEC adopted provincially (e.g., Ontario OESC). GFCI/AFCI requirements apply per province; confirm with authority having jurisdiction (AHJ).

items.source: NEC 2020 210.8(A) summaries; Ontario adoption of CEC; ESA bulletins (AFCI/GFCI context).

approach: Single portable dust collector on wheels
Shop-vac/dust extractor + cyclone for small tools
specifications.notes: Short movable hose runs maintain high CFM; plan for convenience to avoid skipped hookups.

tool_specific_analysis.description: Mobile suitability for ALL woodworking tools, not just examples

mobile_suitability.rationale: Common mobile bases; accuracy maintained if base is rigid and tool is set on pads/levelers.

mobile_requirements.base: Steel adjustable mobile base with drop-down pads or total-lock casters
mobile_requirements.stability_notes: Lock all corners; ensure base supports extension wings/outfeed.
mobile_requirements.dust: 4" hose quick-connect; consider overhead drop or long flex hose

mobile_suitability.rationale: Portable stands or cabinet stations on casters; mobility enables long stock crosscuts.

mobile_requirements.base: Folding stand with wheels or mobile cabinet with wings/stops
mobile_requirements.caster_size_inches: ≥3 on cabinet; integrated wheels on stands
mobile_requirements.stability_notes: Total-lock casters; ensure slide clearance from wall

mobile_suitability.rationale: Small footprint; mobile base widens stance; roll out for large work.

mobile_requirements.base: Universal base; widen footprint; 4 total-lock casters

mobile_suitability.rationale: Mobility provides long infeed/outfeed clearance; base must be rigid to keep tables coplanar.

mobile_requirements.stability_notes: Drop-down pads; add low shelf mass

mobile_suitability.rationale: Ideal on flip-top or dedicated cart; stows under benches.

mobile_requirements.stability_notes: Lock casters; orient feed parallel to two wheels
mobile_requirements.power: 120V 15A; separate circuit if used with DC

mobile_suitability.rationale: Heavy; often factory wheels; must park on feet for use.

mobile_requirements.base: Factory mobile kit or 1000 lb-rated base with levelers

mobile_suitability.rationale: Compact; easy to lock down; can be part of saw outfeed/wing.

mobile_requirements.base: Rigid cabinet with drawers on total-lock casters or mounted as saw wing (whole saw mobile)

mobile_suitability.rationale: Tall/Top-heavy; widen base and move slowly.

mobile_requirements.base: Wide-stance base; weight low in cabinet

mobile_suitability.rationale: Low center of gravity on cabinet; integrated storage.
On heavy mobile cabinet; store ballast low.
High mass & dynamic loads; better to lower to floor for use.

mobile_requirements.base: Hydraulic or retractable-caster base with screw-down feet
mobile_requirements.stability_notes: Always set on feet; level before turning

mobile_suitability.rationale: Retractable workbench casters; bench sits on legs for work.

mobile_requirements.base: Retractable caster kit (side-mounted or plate) ≥600–800 lb per set
mobile_requirements.stability_notes: Bench drops to legs; zero-movement for handwork

mobile_suitability.rationale: Compact; ideal on shared flip-top.

mobile_requirements.base: Flip-top with drawer storage; 3–4" total-lock casters

mobile_suitability.rationale: Heavy; benefits from mobility for long stock.
Light; cart storage; easy to reposition for light/visibility.
Stows easily on mobile cart; used intermittently.
Can be on rolling cabinet; demands rigidity and zero shake.

mobile_requirements.base: Very rigid cabinet; total-lock casters; isolate vibration

mobile_suitability.rationale: Designed to move between machines in small shops.
Inherently mobile; pairs with small tools and miter saws.
Portable on wheels; stows under bench.

mobile_requirements.vibration_isolation: Rubber feet or mat on cart
mobile_requirements.power: 120V; avoid shared circuit with high-draw tools

mobile_suitability.rationale: Light; ideal on a narrow rolling cabinet; can dock near lathe.

mobile_requirements.spark_safety: Roll clear of dust; non-flammable parking area
